name: Yasser Ahmed
tagline: Machine Learning & Data Science aspirant exploring data-driven intelligence.
about: I'm Yasser Ahmed, a Machine Learning and Data Science enthusiast passionate about building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.
Currently exploring the intersection of data engineering, predictive modeling, and applied AI. I enjoy working with complex datasets and transforming them into actionable insights.
When I'm not training models or cleaning data, you'll find me experimenting with new ML frameworks, contributing to open-source projects, or diving deep into research papers.
